params._localContext: The local key context for the preimage oracle. Optional, can be set as a constant if the                      implementation only requires one set of local keys.
params._proof: Opaque proof data, can be used to prove things about the prestate in relation to the state of the               interface's implementation.

returns.postState_: The hash of the post state witness after the state transition.

oracle().notice: Returns the preimage oracle used by the state machine.

step(bytes,bytes,bytes32).notice: Performs the state transition from a given prestate and returns the hash of the post state witness.
